## AST.randomAST() method

Returns a random AST with given max tree depth. The max depth provided in [ASTOpts](./gp.astopts.md) is used by default.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
randomAST(maxDepth?: number): ASTNode<OP, T>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  maxDepth | <code>number</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`ASTNode<OP, T>`
